article.Heading: Budget 2016: Political affairs committee finalises dates
article.Summary: The economic survey will be tabled on the February 25 followed by Railway Minister, Suresh Prabhu laying out the railway budget on February 26.
article.Body:
The government's political affairs committee has finalised the dates for the budget session of parliament on Thursday.

The first session will begin on February 23 and will continue till March 13.

The economic survey will be tabled on the February 25 followed by Railway Minister, Suresh Prabhu laying out the railway budget on February 26.

The most important of them all, the Union Budget will be tabled 3 days later on February 29. The government will definitely hope this session to not turn out like the previous two which were a complete washout.
